articles.title: Are investors taking a rosy view? | Mint - Mint
articles.description: While the market chooses to focus largely on the positives, any negative surprise local or global could catch investors off-guard, leading to a correction.
articles.content: The June quarter earnings season is out of the way for equity investors. Performance of India Inc. was largely in line with expectations. Demand trends were mixed. With easing input costs, companies … [+3481 chars]
